Puerto Jiménez

The Puerto Jiménez is a small town in the south of Costa Rica. It is a beautiful place with a lot of nature and wildlife. This town is the primary gateway to the Corcovado National Park, one of the most biodiverse places in the world.

How to get there

The best way to get to Puerto Jiménez is by plane from Juan Santamaría International Airport in San José. You can also take a bus from San José to Puerto Jiménez.

Read more

The most important places around there

Here you can find the most important places around Puerto Jiménez.

Activities

Hike

Embark on an unforgettable journey through Corcovado National Park, a UNESCO World Heritage site renowned as one of Earth's most biodiverse sanctuaries. Experience close encounters with exotic wildlife, trek through pristine rainforest, and discover hidden waterfalls in this natural paradise.

Fishing

Discover world-class sport fishing in the pristine waters of Puerto Jiménez. Whether you're casting lines in the crystal-clear Pacific Ocean or exploring serene river systems, our waters offer exceptional opportunities for both novice and experienced anglers to catch prized game fish.

Kayaking

Navigate through stunning mangrove forests and serene waterways in Puerto Jiménez's premier kayaking destinations. Our diverse network of rivers and protected coves offers both peaceful nature exploration and exciting adventures for paddlers of all skill levels.

Snorkeling

Dive into the vibrant underwater world of the Golfo Dulce, where crystal-clear waters reveal an extraordinary marine ecosystem. Swim alongside tropical fish, observe graceful sea turtles, and explore colorful coral reefs in one of Costa Rica's most pristine marine environments.

Transportation

Airport Transfers

Start your Puerto Jiménez adventure seamlessly with our reliable airport transfer services. We offer comfortable, air-conditioned vehicles and experienced drivers for direct transportation between Puerto Jiménez Airport and your accommodation, ensuring a stress-free arrival and departure.

Local Taxi Services

Navigate Puerto Jiménez with ease through our trusted network of local taxi services. Available 24/7, our licensed drivers provide safe and convenient transportation to restaurants, beaches, and local attractions at competitive rates.

Boat Transportation

Experience the stunning Golfo Dulce with our professional boat transportation services. Whether you're heading to remote beaches, planning a fishing expedition, or crossing to neighboring communities, our experienced captains ensure safe and scenic journeys across these pristine waters.

Car Rentals

Explore the Osa Peninsula at your own pace with our carefully selected rental vehicles. From compact cars to 4x4 SUVs equipped for adventure, we partner with reliable local agencies to provide well-maintained vehicles perfect for your Costa Rican journey.

Uber

Uber is a ride-sharing service that allows you to request a ride from your phone or computer. It is a great way to get around Puerto Jiménez.
